alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:27PM EDT until July 08 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Bamberg County in central South Carolina... East central Aiken County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 426 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Gaston, or 17 miles northwest of Orangeburg, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, Claflin College, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, North, Springfield, Salley, Neeses, Norway, Perry, Woodford, Cordova, Livingston, Cope, Perry Airport, Prince of Orange Mall and Edisto. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 141 and 145. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
